resources.string: To block ads in Samsung Internet:

Go to your Home screen > Internet > MORE > Settings > Advanced > Block content then toggle the switch on and make sure Adblock Fast is selected.

To unblock ads, come back to this app then press the Adblock Fast button.

If you have a Samsung device, you’ll receive an over-the-air update from Samsung soon. Otherwise, you’ll soon be able to install or update to the new Samsung Internet from Google Play.

Keep Adblock Fast installed. We’ll send a notification to your device when you’ve been updated or can install or update from the Play store and can start blocking ads.
If you have questions or comments, follow and message us on Facebook or on Twitter.
